text: "Death Wish" is a song by American singer-songwriter Gracie Abrams, written by Abrams and Aaron Dessner. Abrams released the song live at the O2 Arena on March 6, 2025 at the London stop of her The Secret Of Us Tour. On March 31, 2025, Abrams released a clip of her performance onto Instagram, announcing that the live recording would be released as a special single to streaming platforms. The song received positive reviews and was called a "fan favorite" by Rolling Stone. ==References== Category:2025 songs Category:Gracie Abrams songs
title: Death Wish (Gracie Abrams song)
